name: David Adams
text: Sorry I am late, but so were they! I set up a romantic night out for me and my wife on Valentine's day and ordered pizza as a treat for my kids. I figured there would be a delay, because of the day, boy was I right. After 2 hours I called ‚Ä¶More

name: Steve Swencki
text:
WAS best pizza in the area! And great service too!  Beats all others by a mile!
So, WHY did they close????

name: George
text: I love papa John's but.. the service was slow whenever the guy mumbled on the phone something about it being 15 minutes when realistically it took 40 minutes. Also they don't seem to hire the best crew, they look like druggies and are very ‚Ä¶More

name: Vincent Beard
text: Got my address wrong said was my fault when they looked me up in computer. Food was under cooked. My kids looked at the dried up bread sticks and said what are those. I called and they was very rude. Told me to eat somewhere else then if I ‚Ä¶More

name: Richie Rich
text: Was longing for a papa John's pizza it's been along time and was my cheat day from the gym. So I googled the closest to me and found this in greensburg. So I read the reviews and was still craving papa John's even though reviews were mostly ‚Ä¶More

name: Cristof Fry
text: Papa John's is kinda gross, but they have a duck named Ruffles and it's totally worth it.

name: p Simms
text: This place isnt bad. It isn't great either. That being said if you use promo codes and order online you can find some nice deals. The pepperoncini and garlic sauce that comes with it is good too. One thing I dont get about the garlic sauce is sometimes its runny and oily and sometimes its thick and creamy. Its always a surprise lol

name: Damon Johnson
text: Ordered a delivery. When it was almost an hour past expected delivery time I checked the tracker and it said it was already delivered. I called the store and they said the driver forgot to grab my order and he will be there in a couple ‚Ä¶More

name: David Tiberio
text: Haven't gone to Papa John's in a while, figured would try it for dinner tonight. Pulled in to find two workers on their smoke breaks, puffing away directly in front of the entrance. Nothing like the smell of cigarette smoke to work up an ‚Ä¶More

name: jonathan schmidt
text: First time ordering from papa John's I have to say for the price of the spicy Italian pizza o ordered I am extremely disappointed. A little bit of sausauge and peperoni and some cheese and that's it. Where is the spicy Italian flavor I may ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Frantz
text: Called for a delivery and they wouldn't deliver a measly 4 miles away. Person on the phone was rude and just hung up on me after telling me that she coulsnt deliver.

name: Google User
text: I have mixed feelings about this Papa Johns. There are days where I go in and the Staff is extremely friendly, cool and the food comes out great and other days where staff act like they don't want to take your orders and when they do the ‚Ä¶More

name: Mary Noel King
text: Pizza just isn't the same ,very greasy ,garlic overload and my son found hair in his pizza ..never again ü§¢

name: Will Johnson
text: The service was good.  Folks are very polite, but lots of wait time this evening even for a pickup order.

name: Rodney Ayers
text: This is the best delivery Pizza I have had.  They are always on time and always fresh!  The online ordering is very easy.

name: lauren helfer
text: I can't not believe the experience I've had with Papa Johns this evening. I order from here all the time and never once have had a bad experience until now. Ordered the food... waited and waited.. almost an hour and a half into it, we ‚Ä¶More

name: richard adair
text: Definitely love papa johns pizza never had a bad pizza great service excellent people

name: Denise Fishel
text: The service was terrible, but the food was good.  When we arrived to pick up our food the woman on the phone was totally frustrated and didn't seem to know what she was doing on the register, as she had to continuously ask the woman standing back behind her prepping the food.

name: Chuck Hamman
text: This is by far the worst store I have ever done business with.  They never answer the phone or they put you on hold forever.  They have lost my order or the register won't work ( and the "manager" ignored the request for help from his ‚Ä¶More

name: Liza Reiber
text: I ordered a buffalo chicken pizza and they forgot the BUFFALO sauce... That would be like forgetting the chicken... They're kind of key ingredients included in the name. This is the second time this has happened and I will never be ordering from papa johns again.

name: Donald Hyatt
text: Carry out, food was finished just in time (15 min), excellent service and polite

name: Alex Soroka
text: Greatest  pizzas  at great prices

name: Chuck Gould
text: It's Papa Johns so of course it's good. Friendly staff; an employee helped me when I locked my keys in my car!

name: Erika Rebar
text: best pizza and greatest deals and specials around this area!

name: Jill Falkosky
text: Always friendly and usually quickly delivery. Quick to fix mistakes the few times they have occurred.

name: Duane Carper
text: Great Philly Steak pizza

name: Joe Bargielski
text: Friendly employees and good service.

name: Joseph Griffin
text: The delivery boy for another Time was very rude. Why don't they use Google maps to find a place. Old woman, 45 minutes waiting because he went to the wrong street and just left. 10/13 /16

name: Sherwin
text: Poor and slow service. By far worst pizza placein Greensburg . Workers hate thier jobs and needs to get fired

text: Foods pretty inconsistent, some pizzas have barely any toppings. The staff sits out front and make lewd conversation amongst each other and smoke.

name: Michael John Granata
text: I live 4 miles away and they will not deliver to me. No matter when you call up and ask they say they have a 6 mile deliver range. But after reading the reviews I am glad that I would not order. Seems this locations is one of the worse.
